channel.title: Microsoft-365-developer-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

image.title: Microsoft-365-developer-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft-365-developer-community-calls on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 15th of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: List formatting magic - neomorphic design for polished UX and Using Mockaroo Independent Publisher Connectors to automatically generate sample data. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connector, 2 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples. Check out Microsoft Teams App camp.

Demos: List formatting magic - neomorphic design for polished UX and Using Mockaroo Independent Publisher Connectors to automatically generate sample data. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connector, 2 script, and 1 Microsoft Teams samples. Check out Microsoft Teams App camp.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 1st of September, 2022
item.description: Demos: Independent Publisher Connector - OpenAI connector on using AI for content creation and interactions AND How to animate SVGs in Adaptive Cards. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 2 script and 3 Power Platform samples. Released Microsoft Teams App camp.

Demos: Independent Publisher Connector - OpenAI connector on using AI for content creation and interactions AND How to animate SVGs in Adaptive Cards. Delivered 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 2 script and 3 Power Platform samples. Released Microsoft Teams App camp.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 18th of August, 2022
item.description: Demos: Independent Publisher Connectors - RegEx Matching Demo, List Formatting Magic – Data and Time formatting options, and Create a list template from your pre-configured list with list formatting definitions. Delivered 2 Independent Publisher Connectors, 10 script, 2 Teams and 4 Power Platform samples.

Demos: Independent Publisher Connectors - RegEx Matching Demo, List Formatting Magic – Data and Time formatting options, and Create a list template from your pre-configured list with list formatting definitions. Delivered 2 Independent Publisher Connectors, 10 script, 2 Teams and 4 Power Platform samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 4th of August, 2022
item.description: Demos: ProvisionGenie v.3.0 – focus on Localization and Accessability and List formatting backgrounds and borders using new isSelected placeholder. Delivered 8 new/updated Power Platform Independent Publisher Connectors along with 5 script, and 2 Power Platform samples.

Demos: ProvisionGenie v.3.0 – focus on Localization and Accessability and List formatting backgrounds and borders using new isSelected placeholder. Delivered 8 new/updated Power Platform Independent Publisher Connectors along with 5 script, and 2 Power Platform samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 21st of July, 2022
item.description: Demos: Document automation using Microsoft SharePoint Syntex Content Assembly, Building a conversational tab in a Microsoft Teams app that captures external event conversations, and List formatting tips. Released Microsoft Graph Toolkit – v2.6.0, 8 connectors, 5 script, 1 Teams, 3 Power Platform samples.

Demos: Document automation using Microsoft SharePoint Syntex Content Assembly, Building a conversational tab in a Microsoft Teams app that captures external event conversations, and List formatting tips. Released Microsoft Graph Toolkit – v2.6.0, 8 connectors, 5 script, 1 Teams, 3 Power Platform samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 7th of July, 2022
item.description: Demos - Building Publishing Connectors for MailJet product, Microsoft Graph “Sites.Selected” permissions within SharePoint Online, and Introduction to available open-source list formatting samples from updated list formatting sample portal. Releases from .Net Libraries and PowerShell + 16 scripts/samples.

Demos - Building Publishing Connectors for MailJet product, Microsoft Graph “Sites.Selected” permissions within SharePoint Online, and Introduction to available open-source list formatting samples from updated list formatting sample portal. Releases from .Net Libraries and PowerShell + 16 scripts/samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 23rd of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.

Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 9th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Sessionize Demo, List Formatting - Payment Registration, and Understanding Sites.Selected permissions in SharePoint Online. Yo teams version preview releases, 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 9 scripts and 1Teams sample. Power Platform Samples Contributor training announced.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Sessionize Demo, List Formatting - Payment Registration, and Understanding Sites.Selected permissions in SharePoint Online. Yo teams version preview releases, 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 9 scripts and 1Teams sample. Power Platform Samples Contributor training announced.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 26th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 12th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos: How to build a SSO bot using yo teams for Microsoft Teams, List formatting magic – Advance discussion board formatting with Power Automate, and Taking advantage of new multi-lingual capabilities in list formatting. Released Yo teams previews, 3 scripts, 1 Teams sample!

Demos: How to build a SSO bot using yo teams for Microsoft Teams, List formatting magic – Advance discussion board formatting with Power Automate, and Taking advantage of new multi-lingual capabilities in list formatting. Released Yo teams previews, 3 scripts, 1 Teams sample!
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 28th of April, 2022
item.description: Three demos: Updates on Independent Publisher Connectors & GitLab Connector Demo, List formatting magic - Discussion board formatting, and TeamsFx .NET - Introduction to Teams Explorer Sample. Released Microsoft 365 Assessment tool 1.0.0 plus 5 script and 1 Teams sample!

Three demos: Updates on Independent Publisher Connectors & GitLab Connector Demo, List formatting magic - Discussion board formatting, and TeamsFx .NET - Introduction to Teams Explorer Sample. Released Microsoft 365 Assessment tool 1.0.0 plus 5 script and 1 Teams sample!
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 14th of April, 2022
item.description: Three demos: TeamsFx .NET - Current Updates - April 2022, Controlling list toolbar with JSON using commandBarProps option, and Building dynamic dashboard pages with list formatting. Released 2 script, 1 Teams and 1 Power Platform samples delivered this week.

Three demos: TeamsFx .NET - Current Updates - April 2022, Controlling list toolbar with JSON using commandBarProps option, and Building dynamic dashboard pages with list formatting. Released 2 script, 1 Teams and 1 Power Platform samples delivered this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 3rd of March, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (140 scenarios and 198 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Power Platform Samples – First Time Contributor – Tuesday, March 8th, 2:00pm PT and AMA (Ask Me Anything) – PnPjs – Tuesday, March 15th, 9am PST. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Join the Microsoft 365 platform call on 8th of March, @ 8 AM PT. Recently refreshed the MGT playground! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 6 new/updated script, 3 Teams and 1Power Platform samples delivered this week.

One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (140 scenarios and 198 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Power Platform Samples – First Time Contributor – Tuesday, March 8th, 2:00pm PT and AMA (Ask Me Anything) – PnPjs – Tuesday, March 15th, 9am PST. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Join the Microsoft 365 platform call on 8th of March, @ 8 AM PT. Recently refreshed the MGT playground! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 6 new/updated script, 3 Teams and 1Power Platform samples delivered this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 17th of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (138 scenarios and 193 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Added today - Ask me anything (PnPjs 3.0 – March 15th) and don’t forget the AMA on February 22 – PnP React Controls. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Released Yo teams - yoteams-build-core v1.6.0 and Microsoft Graph Toolkit (MGT) v2.3.2, and Refreshed the MGT playground! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 6 new/updated script, 46 Bot samples, 2 Power Platform samples delivered this week. Wanted! – Teams Samples.

One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (138 scenarios and 193 scripts) now integrated into Sample Solution Gallery! There were 6 new/updated script, 46 Bot samples, 2 Power Platform samples delivered this week. Wanted! – Teams Samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording – 3rd of February, 2022
item.description: One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (136 scenarios and 187 scripts) including recently added Teams PowerShell support! Sign up and attend an AMA and other events this month hosted by Sharing is Caring. Get the recognition you deserve, sign up for the PnP Recognition Program. Heads down on PnP projects. Expecting to ship Microsoft Graph Toolkit v2.3.2 on Friday! To see current releases and latest updates/nightly builds, access the Repos via the links in table below. There were 5 new/updated script, 5 Power Platform samples delivered this week.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 20th of January, 2021
